title: Plugin Smoke Test Survey
description: A short five-question survey for exercising survey ingestion and response flows during plugin testing.

questions.text: How familiar are you with the Bhash ontology project?
Rate the ease of installing and running the Bhash plugin tooling.
Which Bhash modules are you most interested in exploring?
What is the primary goal you hope to achieve while testing the plugin?
Would you like to participate in future feedback sessions?

labels.true: Yes, keep me in the loop
